heroHeadline: IFICATUM - Contemporary Living on Costa Blanca
heroIntro:
IFICATUM brings contemporary design and quality construction to the Costa Blanca property market. We're proud to showcase 2 exceptional properties from this developer, located in the sought-after Parque del Mediterraneo area. These homes reflect IFICATUM's commitment to modern living spaces with thoughtful design and reliable build standards.

Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, investment opportunity, or holiday retreat, IFICATUM's developments offer competitive value in one of Spain's most popular regions. Explore our current listings and discover what makes these properties stand out in today's market.

aboutSection.title: About IFICATUM
aboutSection.content:
IFICATUM has established itself as a developer focused on delivering quality residential projects across the Costa Blanca. The developer prioritizes functionality and modern aesthetics, creating homes that appeal to both international buyers and Spanish residents.

With properties strategically positioned in prime areas like Parque del Mediterraneo, IFICATUM understands what buyers want: well-planned layouts, contemporary finishes, and locations with genuine lifestyle appeal. Their approach balances quality construction with practical design solutions.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: IFICATUM specializes in contemporary apartment developments in prime Costa Blanca locations. The Apartamentos Victor Manuel II project represents their commitment to creating residential spaces that work for modern living. These properties are designed with today's buyers in mindâ€”offering efficient layouts, quality finishes, and excellent value. The focus on apartment developments allows IFICATUM to create vibrant communities with shared facilities and well-maintained common areas.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Specifications
qualitySection.content: IFICATUM maintains consistent quality standards across all projects. Each property receives attention to construction detail, from structural elements to finishing touches. The developer works with established suppliers and experienced construction teams to ensure homes meet current building regulations and practical expectations. Buyers can expect reliable, well-built properties that deliver real value.

reasons.title: Prime Location

reasons.title: Reliable Developer

faqs.question: Where are IFICATUM properties located?
faqs.answer: IFICATUM properties are located in Parque del Mediterraneo, a popular area on the Costa Blanca with excellent access to amenities and lifestyle facilities.

faqs.question: What type of properties does IFICATUM develop?
faqs.answer: IFICATUM focuses on contemporary apartment developments, such as the Apartamentos Victor Manuel II project, designed for modern living with quality finishes and functional layouts.

faqs.question: How many IFICATUM properties are currently available?
faqs.answer: We have 2 properties currently available from IFICATUM's portfolio. Browse our listings to view details, photos, and pricing information.
